text:
@realDonaldTrump We now have 112,000+ Americans dead from the COVID19 virus. More than 100,000 new cases every week and 1,000 dying daily, yet the daily briefing hasn’t  been held for over a month.  More than 20 states have seen spikes in cases... some as much as 200%. 
Nothing from the WH !
